attributes.action: Create a single Bullying Law that applies to all Schools in England
attributes.additional_details: News Articles. My own experience with my Child. I have spoken to numerous other Parents about their experiences too
attributes.background: Schools are letting pupils down by not taking Bullying seriously and ignoring their policies. There needs to be a Law on Bullying that all Schools have to abide by. There are Children taking their own lives and i feel this would stop if there was a law that made schools help.
